name: Keep Calm (MightyBlob)
description:
My take for the 2021 Bullet Hell Jam.

Keep Calm is a top-down rogue-like shooter where you have 10 seconds to clear each room. If you kill all ennemies but one you get a bonus related to the ennemi that survived. 

The goal is to defeat the boss at the end of five rooms.

Use the downloadable version if you can.

SPOILER:

A description for all the buffs, try and experiment on your own before reading this:

Pink Buff: Gives two health point

Purple Buff: Gives plus one damage

Red Buff: Adds a second to the invulnerability phase following a hit

Orange Buff: 

         -First Point: Speed Up the bullets

         -Second Point: Speed Up the bullets

         -Third Point: Gives a triple shot
